content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** calling all crafters if you re looking for a quick and easy crochet project that s perfect for beginners you found it the tri color trays are the ideal solution to tame clutter in any room of your home place them on the coffee table to hold your remote on your desk for stationery and pens even in the bathroom for jewelry and makeup constructed from a rectangle of multi-colored stripes these trays whip up quickly for housewarming gifts or last-minute décor **yarn used ** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein yardage references material needed for both trays a 01 solid 150 yards 1 skein b 36 solid 150 yards 1 skein c 21 solid 70 yards 1 skein d 09 solid 125 yards 1 skein join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
